ctu_text: \n1. Subscriber contribution to APY shall be made through the facility of \u2018auto-debit\u2019 of the prescribed contribution amount from the savings bank account of the subscriber on monthly, quarterly or half-yearly basis. \n1. The subscribers are required to contribute the prescribed contribution amount from the age of joining APY till the age of 60 years.
